amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases by the same amount, funding for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation for the Army.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct the Defense Department to use $15 million of the $10.8 billion in the Army Research, Development, Test and Evaluation account for research on Gulf War illnesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
